summary:
Name:Nessa
Local:Temple of Kynareth,Whiterun.
level:50~level
She is not powerful. so dont let she fight without powerful weapons,her Body Type is UNP.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][b][size=3][img]http://38.media.tumblr.com/01a135d7fcad8e61bfae0edade012dc5/tumblr_ndqc3fA7nj1tqe8yao3_500.jpg[/img]
This follower mod is standalone.You don't need other mods.[/size][/b][size=5] 

[b][color=#ffff00]With Adoptable version[/color][/b]
[/size][url=http://33.media.tumblr.com/e44d5737f65e6fff0dac4ac78ec40a03/tumblr_ndqc3fA7nj1tqe8yao2_r1_1280.jpg][img]http://33.media.tumblr.com/e44d5737f65e6fff0dac4ac78ec40a03/tumblr_ndqc3fA7nj1tqe8yao2_r1_500.jpg[/img][/url]
[/font][size=4]
Name:Nessa [/size]
[size=4]Local:Temple of Kynareth,Whiterun. ( [b][color=#ffff00]Adoptable version will go to[/color][/b] Jorrvaskr )[/size]
[size=4]Level:50

[/size][font=Georgia][size=4]She is not powerful. so dont let she fight without powerful weapons[/size]
[/font](I am sorry forI'm sorry about those pictures wearing a robe，I only have 7B clothes and I use a 650M GPU)
[font=Georgia][color=#ff7700][size=2][b]
[/b][/size][/color]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=5][b]Welcome everyone upload pics of Nessa ![/b][/size][/color]
[/font]
[b][color=#00ff00][size=4]Recommended Mods[/size][/color]
[/b]
[list][*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by tktk1
[/*]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41304/?]NPCs do not rescale shrink resize when doing idle stuff[/url] by Mahlzeit88
[/*]
[*]Follower overhaul mod
[/*]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037/?]Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]?by fLokii
[/*]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933/?]Extensible Follower Framework[/url] by Expired
[/*]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url] by Dheuster
[/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url]by nao4288[/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]multiple adoptions Mod [/url]by TMPhoenix[/*]
[/list][font=Arial]
[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]Credit：[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[list][*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by tktk1
[/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52287/?]Asian Doll Face[/url]by Lumina[/*]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url] by xp32
[/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57440/?]Enhanced Character Edit - More Body Sliders[/url] by [b]Septfox[/b]
[/*]
[*]UNP underwear version by okashirasan[/*]
[*]OBLhairs—unknow[/*]
[/list][font=Arial]
[size=5][color=#ffff00][u]Adoptable version[/u][/color]
[/size]
[color=#00ff00][size=5]Notes: [/size][/color]
[size=2]- you can only choose one version to install as they use the same esp name; [/size]
[size=2]- the adoption was tested and is compatible with the[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?] multiple adoptions Mod[/url] - see the instructions first before reporting any errors, if you fail to adopt her; [/size]
[size=2]- this child version requires Hearthfire;
[/size]
[b]Credit：[/b][/font][list][*]Lunasprite13 Lunas Lorefriendly Elegance ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/44722/]http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/44722/[/url]?) [/*]
[*] Lunas Lorefriendly MiddleClass Clothes ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/44221/]http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/44221/[/url]?).
[/*]
[/list]
[font=Arial][color=#00ff00][size=5][b]Special thanks to：
[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[size=4]Groovtama，PsychoMachina，pringles89，JRCosta，Eikichi Onizuka and okashirasan (五鉄)
[/size]
[font=Georgia][color=#f4f4f4][size=5]Really thank you very much for your encouragement and help
[/size][/color][/font]
[b][size=5][color=#ffff00]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/size][/b]
